featured.title: Competitive Programming
featured.description: A collection of solutions to competitive programming problems, submitted to online judges, such as Kattis.

featured.title: Arch Setup
featured.description: Installer scripts to quickly set up an Arch-based distro with my custom terminal/shell scripts and install software from the AUR. Sets up any machine to be suitable for my daily workflow. Predecessor to another project that backs up my workspace, arch-backup.

featured.title: Personal Website
featured.description: An overhaul of my personal website/portfolio built in React, used to showcase projects and personal information. Replaces a version built with HTML/CSS/JavaScript without using any libraries or frameworks.
